DOC.brief_title: The MOTHER ( Mobile Technologies Help Enhancing Regular Physical Activity ) Trial Pregnant Women
DOC.criteria: pregnant , gestational week ( 1020 week ) prepregnancy BMI ≥ 18.5 kg•m2 physically inactive work leisure time intent physically active access home telephone mobile phone personal computer access ability communicate ( speak read ) English . know medical obstetric complication restrict physical activity history eat disorder current participation lifestyle modification program history bariatric surgery .
